text: The flag of the Solomon Islands was created in 1977. == Appearance == It is a thin yellow narrow diagonal stripe divided diagonally from the lower hoist- side corner to the upper fly-side corner: the upper triangle is blue with five white five-pointed stars arranged in an "X" pattern and the lower triangle is green. == Other websites == * == References == Solomon Islands Category:Solomon Islands Category:National symbols of the Solomon Islands
title: Flag of the Solomon Islands
